item.title: Docker常用命令
item.description: Docker 基础 List Docker CLI commands docker docker container --help Display Docker version and info docker --version docker version docker info Execute Docker image docker run hello-world Image List Docker images docker image ls Save and load image Save docker save -o dockerName.tar username/repository:tag 示例： # save docker save -o quay.io-calico-node-1.tar quay.io/calico/node:v1.0 Load docker load -i dockerName.tar # load docker load -i quay.io-calico-node-1.tar Export and import image Export docker export CONTAINER ID > imageName.

item.title: Kubernetes环境搭建
item.description: Docker安装 环境：CentOS/RHEL 7.4+ Install prerequisites. yum install -y yum-utils device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2 Add docker repository. yum-config-manager \ --add-repo \ https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo Install docker. yum update && yum install -y docker-ce-18.06.1.ce Create /etc/docker directory. mkdir /etc/docker Setup daemon. cat > /etc/docker/daemon.json <<EOF { "exec-opts": ["native.cgroupdriver=systemd"], "log-driver": "json-file", "log-opts": { "max-size": "100m" }, "storage-driver": "overlay2", "storage-opts": [ "overlay2.override_kernel_check=true" ] } EOF mkdir -p /etc/systemd/system/docker.service.d Restart docker. systemctl daemon-reload && systemctl enable docker && systemctl restart docker 安装环境准备 Disable SELinux setenforce 0 sed -i "s/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g" /etc/selinux/config Disable swap swapoff -a yes | cp /etc/fstab /etc/fstab_bak cat /etc/fstab_bak |grep -v swap > /etc/fstab Stop and disable firewalld systemctl stop firewalld && systemctl disable firewalld Add sysctl settings cat >>/etc/sysctl.
